title: Mario Mutsch - Wikipedia
snippet: In summer 2007 he joined Swiss Super League FC Aarau on the suggestion of his former national team coach Jeff Saibene, who was assistant manager at FC Aarau. On 16 July 2009, it was announced that Mutsch had signed for French Ligue 2 side FC Metz on a free transfer.

title: Mario Mutsch - Manager profile | Transfermarkt
